column6: - THE LAST DAYS - "UNIVERSE 2.0" -Given unheralded new power, the Silver Surfer is tasked with REMAKING THE ENTIRE UNIVERSE! -From the laws of physics to the origins of new life itself, what strange new cosmos will Norrin Radd will into being? -Meanwhile, Dawn Greenwood has a far less intimidating task. All she has to rebuild... is Planet Earth. Plus, if the Surfer, Dawn, and Toomie were the only survivors of the previous cosmos to make it into the void... -...why are they not alone?!
